function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of integration with policymakers and practitioners","Impact":"Limited scope for actual change, risk of being a 'talking shop'","Mitigation":"Integrate with community of policymakers and practitioners, invest in nodes of change with proven histories in local contexts","Technologies":"Community-based research and policy engagement","People":"Researchers, policymakers, practitioners","Owner":"Researchers, policymakers, practitioners"},{"Description":"Focus on single diseases in surveillance systems","Impact":"Failure to address the problem of co-infection, inaccurate representation of disease burden at a community level","Mitigation":"Move beyond disease silos, reframe surveillance to address co-infection","Technologies":"Improved surveillance systems","People":"Public health agencies, researchers","Owner":"Public health agencies, researchers"}]}
